pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tango Photos=====Tango-Photos is a reusable app for photo galleries in Django. While it forms a key component of Tango, it can also be dropped into an existing non-Tango project. ##Installation: pip install tango-photos or pip install git+https://github.com/tBaxter/tango-photos.gittango_shared is a dependency. It will be installed. ## Usage:Add 'photos' and 'tango_shared' to your installed apps, then run syncdb or migrate.
